name: Elijah (Eli) Timmerding
about: I am a senior at Randall K. Cooper High School planning to attend the University of Kentucky to study Chemical Engineering. I also aim to pursue a second major in Business and earn an MBA. During high school, I actively participated in various clubs and achieved numerous honors, including being a Junior Marshal and Senior Homecoming Nominee. A highlight of my experience was working at my high school's spirit store, where I managed customers, designed and ordered clothing, and utilized point-of-sale systems.

experience.title: Employee
experience.company: Randall K. Cooper High School Spirit Store
experience.description: Managed customer interactions, created and entered purchase orders, and designed and ordered clothing for the school spirit store as part of a Retail Marketing class.
